mapper.select: SELECT SP.SP_CODE , SP.SP_NAME, SP.SP_TEL, SP.SP_ADDRESS, SP.SP_CORPNUM, SP.SP_BKIND, BKIND.BK_NAME FROM SP INNER JOIN BKIND ON SP.SP_BKIND = BKIND.BK_CODE
SELECT CL.CL_CODE, CL.CL_NAME, CL.CL_ADDRESS, CL.CL_CORPNUM, CL.CL_HP, CL.CL_BTYPE, CL.CL_BKIND, BK.BK_NAME FROM CL INNER JOIN BK ON CL_BKIND = BK.BK_CODE
SELECT OS.OS_CODE, OS.OS_CLCODE, CL.CL_NAME, TO_CHAR(OS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm') AS OS_DATE, OS_STATE FROM OS INNER JOIN CL ON OS.OS_CLCODE = CL.CL_CODE
